functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Tyre Reaches Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"The surface portions of Tyre were","color":"gray"}','{"text":"largely abandoned even before the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"second reaping, owing to the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"dangerous nature of the cavern and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"the comfortable heat below ground.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Come reaping time, it turned into a","color":"gray"}','{"text":"bottleneck for refugees.","color":"gray"}']}}
